text: Ian Strachan (born 1 November 1940) was a Canadian politician. He represented the electoral district of Eagle River in the Newfoundland and Labrador House of Assembly from 1975 to 1979. He was a member of the Liberal Party.Encyclopedia of Newfoundland and Labrador He was born at Aberdeen, Scotland. Strachan previously worked as a Community Development Worker for Memorial University of Newfoundland Extension Services in Nain. He subsequently served as independent facilitator chair of the Combined Councils of Labrador. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:Living people Category:Liberal Party of Newfoundland and Labrador MHAs Category:Politicians from Aberdeen Category:Scottish emigrants to Canada Category:People from Labrador
title: Ian Strachan (Newfoundland and Labrador politician)
